attributes.action: not include Milton Keynes in the 2018 bid for England to host the World Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Milton Keynes as you may be aware have been chosen as one of the host cities for the World Cup bid in 2018. Milton Keynes FC is a stolen football club and their franchise should not be allowed the privelages a world cup brings.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
